questionTitle: A man whom people cannot trust will have ...................... friends.
John enjoyed the food most, but for ...................... it was the friendliness of the people that was the most wonderful thing.
If he had not given me advice, I ........... again.
The problem is easy enough, but ...................... students could answer it.
A person who is able to perform card tricks is called ......................
A space next to a road where cars, lorries etc can park out of the way of the traffic is called ......................
A chemical substance which you put on cuts, etc to prevent them from developing disease is called ......................
A trick played upon a person in order to make others laugh is called .........
Their situations are now ................. The employee has become the employer.
I've enjoyed myself very much. But it's very late. ...................
Some children have to suffer from lifetime .................... .
Please ............... your cigarette. I'm allergic to smoke.
